column3: The Legal basis used to justify processing of personal data
column9: Legal basis (plural: legal bases) are defined by legislations and regulations, whose applicability is usually restricted to specific jurisdictions.

column3: Consent of the Data Subject for specified processing
Creation, completion, fulfilment, or performance of a contract involving specified processing
Fulfilment or performance of a contract involving specified processing
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Specific or special categories and instances of legal basis intended for justifying data transfers
Processing necessary to enter into contract
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Legal Obligation to conduct the specified processing
Legitimate Interests of a Party as justification for specified processing
Legitimate Interests of a Data Controller in conducting specified processing
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Legitimate Interests of a Third Party in conducting specified processing
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Processing necessary or authorised through the official authority granted to or vested in the Data Controller
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Processing is necessary or beneficial for interest of the public or society at large
Processing is necessary or required to protect vital interests of a data subject or other natural person
Processing is necessary or required to protect vital interests of a data subject
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: Processing is necessary or required to protect vital interests of a natural person
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan

column3: End User License Agreement is a contract entered into between a software (or service) developer or provider with the user
Contract between a service provider and user. Also known as 'Terms of Use' or 'Terms and Conditions'
